name: jftorrent
short_description:
Java based Torrent client, tracker and maker all-in-one.
Note : Does NOT support DHT or Web Extentions or magnet files (there are sites to convert magnets to torrents though). 
Based on the JavaForce library.
summary: Java based Torrent client, tracker and maker all-in-one.
